thread.section_title: Hotel Africana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Busy business hotel
thread.title_full: Busy business hotel - Review of Hotel Africana, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Patty6-13
title: Busy business hotel
text: We stayed a week at the Hotel Africana on business. It is a 15 minute walk to the center of town. Ask for a room in the tower as it is newer. Rooms are large and quiet. Security is good. Afternoons & evenings out back on the lawn is where the action is. There was live music or a DJ each evening which added to the energy. Breakfast is buffet with made to order eggs & omelets---good service. The concierge desk staff are very helpful.
